name: Inner Hell
description:
Submitted important changes and fixes few hours before deadline. Please re-download, if you downloaded the game before "5 hour left" mark. Thank you.

CONTROLS: 

  • WASD (Keyboard/Mouse Required)
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • Right Mouse Button - Blink

Greetings :) I present to you my Inner Hell. 2019 Winter #ue4jam submission.

  • Team Name: EvaStudio
  • "Team": Vasiliy Kashiskiy, vorotasibiry@gmail.com
  • Game Name: Inner Hell
  • Scene composition, idea, programming, game logic, and also the voice lines were made during the jam. My friend Elizaveta Tjuneeva helped me with the voice lines and I can use them with her permission.
  • What wasn't made during the jam: Music - Which plays in the  end - made by me before the jam many years ago. The other one from the start - Kevin Macleod. Models, Textures, Animations: Mixamo, Infinity Blade Grass Lands, AdvancedVillagePack. Sounds - Soundly.
